title: Unauthorized: Barcelona Life
author: VD
content_html: The latest episode of Barcelona Life, in which Farley engages in an epic battle with a monstrous Roast Beast and emerges victorious. Not all heroes wear capes. Some, it seems, wear aprons. For Unauthorized subscribers only.
content_text:
